properties.title: Look Mum No Hands
properties.description: Great coffee shop, No WiFI between 12-2 though.

properties.title: Costa Coffee Tooley Street
properties.description: Seats near the window with power sockets, unlimited WiFi. A bit soulless, but less distracting for it.

properties.title: Counter Albion
